title: Simple buttercream icing
portion: Makes enough for one large cake
description: A quick and easy buttercream icing recipe – made with icing sugar, butter and cream cheese – to use on cupcakes, fairy cakes or birthday cakes.
ingredients: 200g full-fat cream cheese, at room temperature

method.Step 1: Put the butter and cream cheese in a mixing bowl (see tips) and beat with an electric mixer until combined and smooth.

method.Step 2: Sift in the icing sugar in batches, beating well between each addition until smooth.
